TopicTitle: post your War Thunder service record!

Articles.Content:
Post the War Thunder service record of your nation and battle type of choice! You can find yours under your player profile in War Thunder. Sorted by amount of battles per vehicle is helpful!

![servicerecord_segaprophet_040915.jpg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/2850668/_hosted/servicerecord_segaprophet_040915.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-10T00:55:32Z" title="04/10/2015 12:55  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 10, 2015</time> by segaprophet**
